body: Is she a slut? Or a helper?
Seems like a pretty empty way to live life. Kinda gross that he banged her, tbh. Would have preferred that he just walk away.

Sad but at least the guy got motivation. Hope he can change the girl's mind. She couldnt go out with anyone since she can't refuse anyone advance. At least she knows it's better not getting in a relationship so that she wont hurt anyone with those request
